/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a vibrant street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of looking up towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street itself is lined with lush green trees, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. A white car is seen driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static scene. The buildings in the background rise high, their architecture hinting at the city's rich history and cultural heritage. The image is a beautiful blend of nature and urban life, showcasing the unique charm of Beijing.
